nodes.text: How are things with you today?
I wrote a new song for Sophia today...

Sophia... I just saw a girl named Sophia,
And suddenly I start
to give away my heart
to her...

Sophia... I'm in love with a girl named Sophia.
I know that it's inane, but I'll never be the same
again!

Sophia... please say that you'll love me forever,
And I promise I'll always be clever.
Sophia... I'll never stop singing Sophia!
What do you think? Is it worthy of her beauty?
This song clearly proves that you know Sophia's name. I'm sure she'll be flattered.
Great.
Now I have to get up the nerve to sing it for her...
I don't suppose that I could get you to sing it...
No. I could not do it justice.
I'm not sure that anything could be worthy of Sophia's beauty.
Oh... right.
You were right... it is inane. You can stop singing now.

nodes.message: Already talked to Sophia; know she's not interested.

nodes.text: I didn't manage to see Sophia today, sorry.
Please try to see her tomorrow. She's so very special - I know you'll see why I am crazy about her. Be sure to tell her how I feel about her, too.
Sophia is gorgeous - I can see why you are so hooked by her. She thinks you are cute. She can't wait to hear your wonderful songs about her. You should go there tomorrow and sing them for her.
Wonderful! I'll do that as soon as I finish them. Thank you so much for your help. You are my best bud.
I saw Sophia today. She seems like a wild and crazy kind of person. Reminds me a bit of you.
Yes, we were clearly made for one another. I'll try to get my act together so that I can speak with her.
Sophia must be something special to make you this wild about her. You really need to speak to her.
I know... I just want to make sure everything is perfect and rehearse all my lines before I see her. I want to make a good impression.

options.text: Remind Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: I really would appreciate it if you would get some of your stuff off this floor.
I'll try to get around to it after I talk to Sophia.
You know, you would impress people more if you weren't such a slob. Cleaning up around here would be a big start.
<shrug>
I'll try to get to it after I talk to Sophia.
Good night, and Aeolus - try not to hum in your sleep tonight.
I'll never be able to hum again.
Good night, and Aeolus - try not to hum in your sleep tonight.
It's hard to stop singing about Sophia - she's the harmony of my heart, the fugue of my feelings, and the legato of my love.
Then try being pianissimo with your pillow in your mouth, please.
